name: HIPPIH Dog Puzzle Toy 2 Pack
description: Interactive dog toys for treat dispensing and slow feeding. Perfect for puppies and small dogs.

name: Royal Canin French Bulldog Puppy Dry Dog Food, 10.5 lb Bag
description: Formulated specifically for purebred French Bulldog puppies aged 8 weeks to 12 months. Supports immune system development, healthy skin, coat, and digestion.
ingredients: vitamins (DL-alpha tocopherol acetate, niacin supplement, L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate, D-calcium pantothenate, biotin, pyridoxine hydrochloride, riboflavin supplement, thiamine mononitrate, vitamin A acetate, folic acid, vitamin B12 supplement, vitamin D3 supplement)
trace minerals (zinc proteinate, zinc oxide, manganese proteinate, ferrous sulfate, manganous oxide, copper sulfate, calcium iodate, sodium selenite, copper proteinate)
preserved with mixed tocopherols and citric acid
details: Formulated by Royal Canin for purebred French Bulldog puppies aged 8 weeks to 12 months.
Unique kibble shape tailored for easy pickup and chewing by French Bulldogs.
Fortified with an antioxidant complex, including vitamin E, to support immune system development.
Contains essential nutrients to reinforce the skin barrier for a healthy skin and coat.
Highly digestible proteins and precise fiber content help reduce gas and stool odor.

name: Wags & Wiggles Cleanse Hypoallergenic Wipes 100ct
description: Fragrance-free hypoallergenic dog wipes for pets with sensitive skin. Perfect for waterless bathing and keeping your pet fresh on the go.
details: Hypoallergenic wipes are ideal for dogs with sensitive skin, providing a thorough cleanse without irritation.
Fragrance-free formula ensures no additional irritation for sensitive pets.
Made with high-quality ingredients—free of SLS, DEA, and parabens, and safe for use with topical products.
100 wipes per package for long-lasting use.
Convenient and easy to use—perfect for keeping in your car or purse for on-the-go cleaning.
